19#include "ResultPoint.h"
20
21namespace ZXing {
22namespace QRCode {
23
24/**
25* <p>Encapsulates a finder pattern, which are the three square patterns found in
26* the corners of QR Codes. It also encapsulates a count of similar finder patterns,
27* as a convenience to the finder's bookkeeping.</p>
28*
29* @author Sean Owen
30*/
31class FinderPattern : public ResultPoint
32{
33 float _estimatedModuleSize = 0;
34 int _count = 0;
35
36public:
37 FinderPattern() = default;
38 FinderPattern(float posX, float posY, float estimatedModuleSize, int count = 1);
39
40 float estimatedModuleSize() const {
41 return _estimatedModuleSize;
42 }
43
44 int count() const {
45 return _count;
46 }
47
48 bool isValid() const {
49 return _count > 0;
50 }
51
52 /**
53 * <p>Determines if this finder pattern "about equals" a finder pattern at the stated
54 * position and size -- meaning, it is at nearly the same center with nearly the same size.</p>
55 */
56 bool aboutEquals(float moduleSize, float i, float j) const;
57
58 /**
59 * Combines this object's current estimate of a finder pattern position and module size
60 * with a new estimate. It returns a new {@code FinderPattern} containing a weighted average
61 * based on count.
62 */
63 FinderPattern combineEstimate(float i, float j, float newModuleSize) const;
64};
65
66} // QRCode
67} // ZXing
68
